mobilipy.mode_detection¶

Functions

mode_detection(df[, speed_th, ...])

Tags the DataFrame at 'trip' indexes with detected modes in the 'detected_mode' column. Also tags walks with 'walk'. Args: df (pandas.DataFrame): DataFrame to be processed speed_th (float): the walk speed threshold acceleration_th (float): the walk acceleration threshold minimal_walking_duration (float): walk duration threshold minimal_trip_duration (float): trip duration threshold.

mobilipy
